titles.title: To authorize the use of certain rail relocation funding for high-speed rail projects.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 10/3/2011--Introduced. Requires at least 25% of amounts appropriated to the Secretary of Transportation (DOT) for capital grants to states for rail line relocation and improvement projects to be used for high-speed rail or associated projects.
